column4: I am trying to completely remove mysql-server-5.1 but it always gives me an error
mysql server 5.1 wont go away.....anybody to help please?:)
what do you mean wont go away, config files left behind?
you get same error from command line or it does nothing
and i assume you did sudo or are root
also when last time worked correctly
sorry man - hate to be that guy and say it but google loaded with pages on that msg - i just cant find one that singles out your problem
that will put back windows bootmngr but will not have access to ubuntu
boot win disk if have - choose recovery - then cmd then type bootrec.exe /fixmbr
but i am planning to reinstall ubuntu from fresh again
that command will just get you back into windows - then when you go to install ubuntu will prob have to delete the partitions from old install
easily if u have a ubuntu livecd
not to long ago refered someone to http://ubuntu.sabza.org/2008/03/21/fixing-grub-from-within-windows/ but not sure if worked for him
can try that if cant get hands on cd
if u do and it not a pain - lemme know if worked for ya
